channel.title: Runescape Hunger Games - “May the odds be ever in your favor!”
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m193/mrgiggles1993/bannerhungergames2_zps54ceea01.png[/img] [URL=http://www.HG-RS.com/home/play.html]Play now![/URL] | [URL=http://www.HG-RS.com]Website[/URL] | [URL=https://www.facebook.com/runescapehg]Facebook[/URL] | [URL=http://hg-rs.com/forum/]Forums[/URL][/CENTER]
[SIZE=2]Hello and if this is your first time here then I welcome you to our server advertisement! Have you grown tired of most private servers, are you bored of doing the EXACT same thing on each and every one? Well, that's where we promise to be different at. Our server is entirely a [U]mini-game[/U] based server, no leveling, and no grinding for hours on end to achieve goals that you might just end up losing anyways!
Sound good? Well continue on reading! Our gameplay concept is based off the [b]Hunger Games[/b], similar to the [b]Minecraft[/b] servers, but unique and fun in its own way! - [SIZE=1][I]If you don't know what the Hunger Games are, then you should definitely go watch the movie or read the book, you'll love them![/I][/SIZE]
SO, do you think you can fight off 15 or more players in a timed death match? Oh not to mention, the only items you can acquire are the ones that you find around the map, or from the players you've killed. Think you have what it takes? Only the best can win!
You can unlock or buy [I]special kits[/I] to help your chances of winning, unlock [I]new perks[/I] that increase passive abilities, and fight your way to the top! If you think you have what it takes, then please join, and be prepared to fight for your life![/SIZE]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m193/mrgiggles1993/portfolio4_zps56a141bf.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m193/mrgiggles1993/portfolio2_zps4d0b5240.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m193/mrgiggles1993/portfolio1_zps2b172606.jpg[/img][/CENTER] [center][youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ONQ7ijxGV64[/youtube][/center]
[SIZE=3]Kits description*[/SIZE]
[ul][*][B]Default:[/B] Has a slight chance for a little more food from chest drops [*][B]Berserk:[/B] Has a slight chance to increase your max hit damage, start with a zerker necklace and a super strength pot [*][B]Archer:[/B] Have the ability at random to shoot quicker with an MSB, also have a higher chance to get arrows or any ammo from chests. Start with ranger boots and an MSB. [*][B]Elementalist:[/B] You don't need any elemental runes (Airs, fires, etc) while casting spells. Also you have a higher chance of getting runes from chests. Start with Ancient staff and wizard boots. [*][B]Alchemist:[/B] Start with a mixture of herbs and vials to make potions.(Note there is no other way to get most pots unless you're alchemist). Also have a high chance to drop herbs and vials from chests. [*][B]Forsaken:[/B] Spawn in a random spot outside of the circle during the beginning of the match. [*][B]Perished:[/B] When you die you'll respawn on the same spot with your items and 60 hp. You can only do this once per game. [*][B]Venom:[/B] Has a chance to poison anyone you hit with any weapon. Your poison will do 10 damage. You can't poison other venoms. [*][B]Blizzard:[/B] You have a chance to freeze the person you're fighting with a damage-less ice barrage (10% with range, and 20% with melee). You start with ice gloves and must wear these to get the effect. [*][B]Flash:[/B] You have the ability to teleport anywhere you click, whether it's on the minimap or the main game screen. You start with boots of lightness and must be wearing these for the effect. You'll have a 20 sec cooldown. [*][B]Looter:[/B] Increase your chances for rare items by 50%. You start with a rogues mask and must wear this for the effect. [*][B]Jumper:[/B] Start with a portal item that lets you place a portal down anywhere you want. Later you can teleport back to the portal. The cooldown is 100 seconds. [*][B]Skiller:[/B] Start with two saradomin brews, some unfinished rune arrows, and a prayer potion. You can fix barrows within your inventory with a 100% success rate, and you can steal already cooked fish from stalls.(Normally raw)[/ul]
[SIZE=3]More pictures*[/SIZE] [CENTER][IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m193/mrgiggles1993/19people_zpsba2da7e8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m193/mrgiggles1993/dm_zps93bf3268.png[/img]
Random in-game pictures [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m193/mrgiggles1993/15_zpsea4f474d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m193/mrgiggles1993/16_zps008d26af.png[/img] [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m193/mrgiggles1993/18_zps5f573ab7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m193/mrgiggles1993/17_zps52d18626.png[/img] [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m193/mrgiggles1993/5_zps0da30cb8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m193/mrgiggles1993/6_zps6198d35d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m193/mrgiggles1993/9_zps72c49c7b.png[/img] [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m193/mrgiggles1993/11_zpsc2be0347.png[/img] [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m193/mrgiggles1993/1_zps480b176e.png[/img] [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m193/mrgiggles1993/14_zps37e3a2f7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m193/mrgiggles1993/10_zpsb932dae2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m193/mrgiggles1993/13_zps75e39684.png[/img]
Other [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m193/mrgiggles1993/7_zps7d7fbf6d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m193/mrgiggles1993/2_zps6ea070ec.png[/img] [/CENTER

item.title: Runescape Hunger Games - “May the odds be ever in your favor!”
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

[quote=“liamp, post:94, topic:529138”][quote author=CoderOops link=topic=647894.msg4412142#msg4412142 date=1394202538]

really good server but everyone just gangs up on you at the start so you start a game they gang up on you then you have to wait 10mins for a new game to start because people like these idiots just sit around with each other gaining experience …

Teaming is part of hunger games idea.
Join clans on forums or create your own (: …!
Happy hunger games
[/quote]

i know it is but sitting there teaming up then kill everyone that they don’t know then they just sit there for the rest of the game gaining experience please read what i wrote … its not about the teaming just the way they gain the experience is stupid, kill everyone else off then sit there until time runs out for experience stupid…[/quote]
Isnt that exactly what you want there to be?
Kill and then be last 1 standing (with friends you will get benefits)

I see nothing wrong with it.

Read full topic
